amendment.description: To amend the requirements for speedy notice to victims and to require a report to Congress.
amendment.purpose: To amend the requirements for speedy notice to victims and to require a report to Congress.

action.text: Amendment SA 16 proposed by Senator Coburn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 16 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 57. Record Vote Number: 18.
